title: Move the plates change in E and V

content.question: A second identical plate with a charge <math alttext="negative Q" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mo>âˆ’</mo><mi>Q</mi></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> is added a short distance above the first plate, as shown in the figure. If <math alttext="E" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>E</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> is the magnitude of the electric field a short distance off the original plate, which of the following statements is correct for the magnitude of the electric field between the plates?

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
